page.title: 13Church Choir cont....
page.content: When we walk up to the choir stalls,the boy holds a cross and we all follow him.The sopranos file into the choir stalls first,then the altos go opposite the sopranos then the tenors and basses at the back of the sopranos have to use two stalls because there are so many.The vicar ,rector,leaders and the conductor go at the end,we usally go two by two. When we have finished the service we walk out again and we go into the vestry and say a prayer and undress (we wear our robe over the top of our clothes).We have drinks of tea and cakes,biscuits. We go to King's College every year there are many choirs who sing we all join together and sing.It's good fun because we walk through closed roads walking to the college and everybody takes pictures.
